body.name: Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount for Most 40–82 inch TVs, Preassembled and Telescopic Front Support with Swivel, Tool-Free Tilt, Fits 12″/16″ Wood Studs, Max VESA 600x400mm, Up to 100lbs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 49 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 49 mins
features: Easy Installation: The preassembled and telescopic front support makes wall mounting installation easier. Simply attach the TV brackets, mount the arm assembly, then hang your TV. With an opening in the center, the wall plate can accommodate an electrical outlet for easier placement.

Wide Compatibility: This full motion TV mount fits most 40″–82″ flat or curved TVs with VESA mounting patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. The TV wall mount is compatible with 12″/16″ wood studs, concrete, and brick wall mounting. Tips: Do not mount on drywall alone.

Stable at Full Extension: With dual TV bracket hooks, sturdy security locks and 33% thicker arms, this TV mount provides maximum stability for your 4K, OLED, or LED TV. Extend the mount arms out to 16.7″ for comfortable viewing or retract to 3.1″ for a streamlined look.

One-Handed Swivel: Easily redirect your screen with one hand by turning it 45° left or right toward your viewing position—perfect for rooms with multiple viewing areas. Tilt your TV +5°/-15° to minimize glare, or level by +/-3° to fine tune your TV’s position after installation.

Product Includes: Our full motion TV mount includes detailed instructions, mounting hardware, and drilling template for hassle-free installation. And our US-based customer service is always available for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy-Peasy TV Mount!
reviews.reviewText: The Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount is a total win! I installed it myself – no tools required. It fits my 65-inch TV perfectly, and I can tilt and swivel it for the perfect view. Super sleek and sturdy – my living room just got an awesome upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars *For 16inch on center walls* - Holds ~65lb 65 inch TV no issue
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded our main TV so the old one went into the bedroom. It's pretty far across the room so I wanted a mount that'd give me every inch closer to the bed. This wallmont is well built and the included hardware is good. One thing to note is that it's for 16inch on center studs. I didn't realize I have 24inch upstairs so I had to fab up a mounting plate from from 3/4 plywood. Not a big deal if you have the tools. This wallmount mounted to that plate holds over 100lbs easily in testing. Our actual TV is a 65inch ~65lb and has zero issues supporting that at full extension. It adjusts easily. I really have nothing bad to say about it the mount or the install kit it comes with. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install. Solid product.
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this mount. I needed a mount that supports a 400x600 (older Panasonic LCD). This was the cheapest I could find. Turns out to be the best and easiest mount I’ve owned. I didn’t struggle at all to hang the TV to the wall mount. I highly recommend this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, easy to mount. Would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item, this is not a paid review. I ordered this to mount a 55" TCL Roku TV. The mount appears to be well made and very sturdy. It is easy to extend, swivel, and tilt and stays where you put it right out of the box, no annoying drifting. The price is very attractive, even better than a similar item at a local "freight company near the harbor". Everything was included (except tools, of course), even a small level and some Velcro cable ties. Like another reviewer, I used a longer level just to be safe. Hanging it was straightforward, a stud finder makes it easier. Very pleased and would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to description
reviews.reviewText: Simple to set up and is just as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was used to hang a 60" TV. It was easy to hang and holds the TV very good. The order was processed quick and we received it fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with quality
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed with the quality of this product. I assumed I would have to upgrade hardware, but they provided larger screws (5/16) than I would have used. They send a nice package of hardware to connect to many TV styles. The design is really solid and easy to install.The mount is just big enough to span two wall studs, so there is not much flexibility there. You can slide the TV a few inches on the mount. So it worked for me. If it lined up centered on a stud, I guess you have to attach boards to the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tv mount is awesome! The price is a bonus.
